protein.specific_function: Regulatory light chain of myosin. Does not bind calcium

protein_properties.protein_sequence: >Myosin light chain 1/3, skeletal muscle isoform MAPKKDVKKPVAAAAAAPAPAPAPAPAPAPAKPKEEKIDLSAIKIEFSKEQQDEFKEAFL LFDRTGDSKITLSQVGDVLRALGTNPTNAEVRKVLGNPSNEELNAKKIEFEQFLPMMQAI SNNKDQATYEDFVEGLRVFDKEGNGTVMGAELRHVLATLGEKMKEEEVEALMAGQEDSNG CINYEAFVKHIMSI
